תורח נביאים וכתובים THE HOLY SCRIPTURES ACCORDING TO THE MASORETIC TEXT A NEW TRANSLATION WITH THE AID OF PREVIOUS VERSIONS AND WITH CONSTANT CONSULTATION OF JEWISH AUTHORITIES PHILADELPHIA THE JEWISH PUBLICATION SOCIETY OF AMERICA 5677-1917
